page.title: 11Sparkwell playground games.
page.content: Sometimes we play "Off ground hit". Here is how we play it. Someone is up and everyone else has to climb on top of something. The person that is up has to try and catch you when you are not on top of something. Then the person that's caught has to be up. Sarah Short. To play "Doctor, Doctor" you need a group of about five people. One person goes away so that he cannot see what the others are doing. While he is away the other people join up in a circle and weave in and out of each other and when their bodies and arms and legs are all twisted together they shout "Doctor, Doctor". The other person has to come back and untwist them and get them back into the original circle. Everyone takes turns at being doctor. Johanna Stidson.
